name: Kings Gambit
description:
An open world RPG. This game is the first in the Kings Gambit trilogy and sets in motion the events which will change the history of the kingdoms forever.

This is the story of 2 heroes and their allies, who must save the kingdoms from the invasion of monsters, bandits and cultists. 

Follow Ark on his journey to become a hero.

(Note: This game was converted to HTML format but this ended in countless bugs so I have provided a downloadable copy of the original game instead.)
